name: Explosive Kicking
description: Train powerful and high-speed kicks that maximize impact and efficiency.

cards.title: Front Snap Kick
cards.description: A quick and powerful kick aimed at the opponentâ€™s midsection or head.
bulletpoints: Chamber the knee before extending the leg
Snap the foot forward for a sharp impact
cards.summaryText: Pop the front snap kick by chambering tight, snapping out, and recoiling instantly.

cards.title: Roundhouse Kick
cards.description: A powerful circular kick aimed at the ribs or head.
bulletpoints: Pivot on the standing foot to generate torque
Keep the leg extended throughout the motion
cards.summaryText: Whip the roundhouse with a hard pivot and full follow-through to blast the target.
